list.name: Laden
list.rawQuery:
SELECT $__time(StartDate),
concat('Laden: ', (select address from pos where pos.id = chargingstate.Pos), ' / ' , (select charging.charge_energy_added from  charging where chargingstate.EndChargingID = charging.id), ' kWh') as text 
FROM chargingstate 
WHERE $__timeFilter(StartDate) and timestampdiff(MINUTE, StartDate, Enddate) > 5 and CarID = $Car
order by StartDate desc

list.name: Laden fertig
list.rawQuery:
SELECT $__time(EndDate),
concat('Laden fertig: ', (select address from pos where pos.id = chargingstate.Pos), ' / ' , (select charging.charge_energy_added from  charging where chargingstate.EndChargingID = charging.id), ' kWh') as text 
FROM chargingstate 
  WHERE $__timeFilter(StartDate) and timestampdiff(MINUTE, StartDate, Enddate) > 5 and CarID = $Car
order by StartDate desc

list.name: Schlafen
list.rawQuery:
SELECT $__time(StartDate),
state as text 
FROM state
WHERE $__timeFilter(StartDate) and state = 'asleep' and CarID = $Car
order by StartDate desc

list.name: Online
list.rawQuery:
SELECT $__time(StartDate),
state as text 
FROM state
WHERE $__timeFilter(StartDate) and state = 'online' and CarID = $Car
order by StartDate desc

targets.rawSql:
SELECT   $__time(datum),  speed as 'Geschwindigkeit [km/h]',   power as 'Leistung [PS]',   ideal_battery_range_km as 'Reichweite [km]', battery_level as 'SOC [%]',  outside_temp as 'Außentemperatur [°C]',  altitude as 'Höhe [m]', inside_temp as 'Innentemperatur [°C]', 
battery_heater * 100 as 'Battery Heater',
is_preconditioning * 100 as 'Preconditioning',
sentry_mode * 100 as 'Sentry Mode',
odometer -  (select min(odometer) from pos WHERE  $__timeFilter(datum) and CarID = $Car) as km

FROM  pos
WHERE  $__timeFilter(datum) and CarID = $Car
ORDER BY  Datum ASC

SELECT $__time(datum), val as 'Zelltemperatur [°C]'
FROM can
WHERE $__timeFilter(datum) and id = 2 and CarID = $Car and val between -50 and 100
ORDER BY datum ASC

SELECT $__time(datum), val as 'Cell imbalance [mV]'
FROM can
WHERE $__timeFilter(datum) and id = 27 and CarID = $Car and val between 0 and 3000
ORDER BY datum ASC

SELECT $__time(datum), val as 'BMS max charge [kW]'
FROM can
WHERE $__timeFilter(datum) and id = 28 and CarID = $Car  and val between 0 and 300
ORDER BY datum ASC

SELECT $__time(datum), val as 'BMS max discharge [kW]'
FROM can
WHERE $__timeFilter(datum) and id = 29 and CarID = $Car and val between 0 and 600
ORDER BY datum ASC

SELECT $__time(datum), val as 'Cell min [v]'
FROM can
WHERE $__timeFilter(datum) and id = 5 and CarID = $Car  and val between 2 and 4.5
ORDER BY datum ASC

SELECT $__time(datum), lat, lng, 0 as type, null as address FROM pos WHERE $__timeFilter(datum) and carid = $Car UNION SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(pos.datum) as time_sec, lat, lng, 1 as type, concat('',address, '
Date: ',pos.datum, '
Duration: ', TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, StartDate, EndDate) ,'min
Charged: ',charging.charge_energy_added, 'kWh
Max Power:', max_charger_power, 'kW') as address FROM chargingstate join charging on endchargingid = charging.id join pos on chargingstate.Pos = pos.id WHERE $__timeFilter(pos.datum) and chargingstate.CarID = $Car and (fast_charger_brand = 'Tesla' or address like '%Supercharger%') UNION SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(pos.datum) as time_sec, lat, lng, 2 as type, concat('',address, '
Date: ',pos.datum, '
Duration: ', TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, StartDate, EndDate) ,'min
Charged: ',charging.charge_energy_added, 'kWh
Max Power:', max_charger_power, 'kW') as address FROM chargingstate join charging on endchargingid = charging.id join pos on chargingstate.Pos = pos.id WHERE $__timeFilter(pos.datum) and chargingstate.CarID = $Car and ((fast_charger_brand is not null && fast_charger_brand not in ('Tesla') and fast_charger_present = 1 and address not like '%supercharger%') or (fast_charger_present is null and max_charger_power > 25 and address not like '%supercharger%')) UNION SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(pos.datum) as time_sec, lat, lng, 3 as type, concat('',address, '
Date: ',pos.datum, '
Duration: ', TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, StartDate, EndDate) ,'min
Charged: ',charging.charge_energy_added, 'kWh
Max Power:', max_charger_power, 'kW') as address FROM chargingstate join charging on endchargingid = charging.id join pos on chargingstate.Pos = pos.id WHERE $__timeFilter(pos.datum) and chargingstate.CarID = $Car and ((fast_charger_present = 0) or (fast_charger_present is null and max_charger_power < 25 and address not like '%supercharger%')) UNION SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(T1.time_sec) as time_sec, lat, lng, 4 as type, concat('', address,'
Date: ',T1.time_sec, '
Duration: ', TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,T1.time_sec, T2.time_sec), 'min') FROM ( SELECT @rowid:=@rowid+1 as rowid, drivestate.EndDate as time_sec, lat, lng, 4 as type, address FROM drivestate join pos on drivestate.EndPos = pos.id, (SELECT @rowid:=0) as init WHERE $__timeFilter(drivestate.EndDate) and drivestate.CarID = $Car ) T1 join ( SELECT @rowid2:=@rowid2+1 as rowid, drivestate.StartDate as time_sec FROM drivestate join pos on drivestate.EndPos = pos.id, (SELECT @rowid2:=0) as init WHERE $__timeFilter(drivestate.EndDate) and drivestate.CarID = $Car ) T2 on T1.rowid+1=T2.rowid ORDER BY time_sec ASC

list.definition: select display_name as __text, id as __value from cars where length(vin) > 5 order by display_name
list.label: Car
list.name: Car
list.query: select display_name as __text, id as __value from cars where length(vin) > 5 order by display_name
